message: I propose dividing the $100 with a 75/25 split. This gives us both a fair share while considering the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
Take a small share now, before it's worth even less
Considering the inflation, I propose a 60/40 split. This maintains a balance between our shares while acknowledging the decreasing value of money in future rounds.
You're getting less with each round, take this offer before it's too late

Given the inflation rate, I suggest an equal division of the remaining funds. This ensures fairness and prevents one side from receiving disproportionately more money due to the diminishing value over time.
